install.name: JReviews Express Reviews Module
install.author: Alejandro schmeichler
install.description: JReviews Express Reviews Module: provides multiple functionality for display of reviews.

param.name: tmpl_suffix
param.label: JRExpress Template Suffix
param.description: This suffix will be applied to the module view file and is useful to create multiple instances of the module that have different outputs.

param.name: ajax_nav
param.label: Enable Ajax Pagination
param.description: Allows users to navigate to other pages inside the module without page reloads.

param.name: module_limit
param.label: Limit results
param.description: Sets the number of results shown in the module

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: Number of columns or items per row to show.

param.name: tn_mode
param.label: Thumbnail Type
param.description: Scale creates thumbnail with specified width and height is scaled proportionately. Crop takes a square from the center of the image and scales to the specified width.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
